襭襭襭

Related Character(s): 擷
Связанный символ (и): 擷

襭字的基本解释

襭
xié
用衣襟兜起来。

襭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》胡結切，入屑，匣。］
(1)把衣襟插在腰带上兜东西。
(2)引申为怀藏，怀抱。

襭字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襭； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1126第46
【唐韻】胡結切【集韻】【韻會】奚結切，?音纈。【玉篇】袵也，以衣袵扱物也。【爾雅·釋器】扱袵謂之襭。【註】扱衣上袵於帶。【詩·周南】薄言襭之。

襭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
襭字的起名意思

暂无。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
xié
Put it up in the placket.
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xié］
["Guang Yun" Hu knot cutting, cutting into chips, box. ]
(1) Put the placket on the belt and pocket things.
(2) Extended to embrace, embrace.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襭; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1126 Page 46
[Tang Yun] Hu Jieqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xi Jieqie,? Sound valerian. [Jade articles] Cloak is also a cloak of clothing. 【Erya·Release Device】Chan Qiao is called 譭. [Note] The dress is placed on the belt. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Those with thin words.
